resources.string: What do you want to listen to?
This privacy policy explains how DN Player app collects, stores, and uses your data. The app is for personal use only and follows privacy standards.
We collect the following data to make your experience better:
• Music Files: We access your local music to play songs.
• Playback Data: We track which songs you listen to often to give better song recommendations.
• User Preferences: This includes things like your liked songs and shuffle settings.
All data collected by the DN Player app is stored on your device. We do not upload your data to any servers or share it with anyone.
The app needs access to your device\'s storage to get and play your music files.
The DN Player app is for users aged 6 and older.
If this privacy policy changes, we will let you know through the app’s settings page.
If you have any questions, you can email us at dteachtiv@gmail.com.
